metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0437 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: When calling bson_utf8_validateÂ on some inputs a loop with an exitcondition that cannot be reached may occur, i.e. an infinite loop. Thisissue affects All MongoDB C Driver versions prior to versions 1.25.0.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
